document_data.name: Biff the Understudy
document_data.mainbody: '''Biff the Understudy''' was a [[human]] male [[fighter]] and an actor in [[Raelis Shai]]'s theater performance at the [[Five Flagons Inn]] in [[Athkatla]] in [[1369 DR]]. He served as an understudy for [[Haer'Dalis]], who was absent. Biff messed up his lines, prompting booing and causing the play to be abandoned.<ref>
